name: St Tophatrick (Jversen)
description:
An entry in the IDX GDT Game Jam 23, theme "The Dark and the Light".

https://itch.io/jam/march-game-jam-23

This game was made by Johan Iversen (https://jversen.itch.io/), Lage Bergman and Miriam Ahlberg (https://mirrish.itch.io/)

Background generated by https://deepai.org

Music recorded from an Irish pub on St Patrick's day 2023.
